programme.title: All The Goals: Rooney
programme.desc: Sit back and enjoy all 253 of our former captain Wayne Rooney's goals that made him United's greatest goalscorer - from a debut hat-trick, to that overhead kick, to the record-breaking free-kick.

programme.title: Lifeblood: History
programme.desc: The first film in our Lifeblood series tells the story of our legendary Academy, all the way up to Alejandro Garnacho's breakthrough.

programme.title: Lifeblood: Climbing the Mountain
programme.desc: The final film in the first Lifeblood series follows the full pathway of an academy player through the various age groups, culminating in a thrilling U18s season finale.

programme.title: PL: United v Man City 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 10/11/94. A classic derby encounter as Brian Horton brought his team across the city to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: United v Ipswich 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/95. An amazing goal-fest at the Theatre of Dreams in March 95 as Andy Cole scored five times in an historic 9-0 victory over Ipswich Town.

programme.title: PL: Bolton v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/96. With a huge trip to Newcastle looming, United looked to keep the pressure on at the top by beating struggling Bolton.

programme.title: PL: United v Nottm Forest 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 28/4/96. United ended their home campaign against Nottingham Forest, knowing that a win would take them to the brink of the Premiership title.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Nottm Forest v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives 6/2/99. Former United boss Ron Atkinson was hoping to get one over his old club when they visited the City Ground with Forest deep in relegation trouble.

programme.title: PL: United v Bradford 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 5/9/00. United battered the Bantams in impressive style with Teddy Sheringham and Quinton Fortune hitting a brace each.

programme.title: PL: United v Southampton 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/00. United welcomed struggling Southampton looking to keep up their scintillating home form, having scored 22 goals in their opening six league contests at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/01. United welcomed Arsenal knowing that victory would move them closer to securing a third consecutive Premiership crown.

programme.title: PL: United v Derby 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 12/12/2001. After 3 Successive League defeats, United hoped to rediscover their form at home to Derby.

programme.title: PL United v Southampton 01/02

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'n amser gwely yng Nghoeden yr Olobobs ac mae Tib yn cael trafferth cysgu - dydy hwiangerdd swynol Lalw ddim yn helpu hyd yn oed! It's bedtime, and Tib is having trouble sleeping!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi yn pledio ar Abel i adael iddi fynd pharsel i Digbi er mwyn ymddiheuro iddo. Betsi pleads with Abel to let her deliver Digbi's parcel so she can apologise to him.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn holi 'Pam bod arogl neis ar flodau?', ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am arddwr gorau'n byd a'i phridd arbennig. Today Nel asks Tad-cu, 'Why do flowers smell so nice?'.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wedi creu cerbyd newydd sbon ar olwynion. Cen Twyn has created a brand new vehicle with wheels. Twt achieves one of his dreams and is able to come out of the water.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn archwilio'r holl synau cerddorol ma nhw'n gallu eu creu gyda phethau ma nhw'n eu ffeindio ar yr ynys. Today, the Woohoos explore all the different musical sounds they can make.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae hyder Sin yn suddo pan mae Myrddin - chef sy'n arbenigo mewn ryseitiau mango - yn cyrraedd y pentref. Myrddin arrives with his Marvellous Mango Roadshow!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Gem ffon yw Hela Pryfed Estron. Mae Norman, Mandy, Sara a Jams yn mwynhau chwarae, efo cystadleuaeth daer rhyngddyn nhw a Siarlys a Meic Flood. The gang play the Alien Bug Hunt phone game.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan fydd afiechyd yn taro cymuned o gimychiaid coch, rhaid i'r Octonots frysio i ddod o hyd i driniaeth. When a population of crawfish is struck by illness the Octonauts must find a cure.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Ellie'n galw Harri o gaffi Beca ym Mhontarfynach; does dim dwr yno a'r tap wedi torri. Ellie calls Harri from Beca's cafe in Pontarfynach, they have no water because the tap is broken.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod hyfryd o aeaf yn y nen a phawb wrth eu bodd! It's a cold winter's day and everyone is happy.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae symud cnau mewn casgen i dy-coeden Cochyn yn profi'n waith anodd! Taking some nuts in a barrel up to Cochyn's treehouse turns into a difficult task!

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae'r cadno coch wedi blino'n ln ond mae'n methu'n glir a chysgu. Mae gan ei ffrindiau sawl awgrym i'w helpu, ond a fydd un ohonynt yn llwyddo? The red fox is bone tired, he needs sleep!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn chwarae ar lan y mr. A fyddant yn dod o hyd i air heddiw, 'iglw' yno? The Abadas are at the seaside but will they find today's word, an 'igloo' there?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn ceisio dyfalu pa anifeiliaid sy'n gwneud y synnau gwahanol ar y fferm. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop try to guess which animals make the noises they hear on the farm.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Blero a'i ffrindiau adfer Ocido i'w chyflwr lliwgar arferol. Blero and friends are left feeling blue when the vacubots suck all the colour out of Ocido.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Jini yn dod ag anifail anwes yr ysgol adref - cwningen slei sydd am gymryd lle Crwbi - ac mae'n rhaid i Crwbi brofi nad y fo sy'n euog! Jini brings home the school pet - a sly rabbit!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Ysgol Y Fenni sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Fenni join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'r haul yn tywynnu yn y Goedwig ac mae'r Olobobs a'u ffrindiau'n cael parti haf! The sun is shining in the Olobob Forest and the Olobobs and their friends are having a summer party!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn poeni nad ydy e'n dda iawn am fod yn ddraig. Dydy e ddim yn gallu hedfan nac anadlu tn fel Gruffudd Goch. Digbi is worried he's no good at being a dragon.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pengwiniaid ddim yn gallu hedfan? Dyma cwestiwn Ela i Tad-cu heddiw. 'Why can't Penguins fly?' is the question Ela asks Tad-cu today.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Bethan yn penderfynu creu casgliad o rywbeth ond mae methu'n ln phenderfynu beth i'w gasglu. Bethan decides to start up her own collection, but can't decide what to collect.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa, and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae Gelert yn credu ei fod wedi ffeindio malwen gyflyma'r byd! Iggy thinks he's found the world's fastest snail!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae tuk tuk Magi'n rasio'n ddi-yrrwr drwy'r pentre', a Sin yn ceisio ei ddal a diogelu'r bresych. Sin tries to stop a run-away tuk tuk and save the cabbages he needs for tonight's menu.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Dilys ar ras yn ceisio cael Norman i'r Ganolfan Weithgareddau Mynydd er mwyn hedfan yn Walabi 2. Dilys rushes to get Norman to the Mountain Activities Centre in time to fly in Walabi 2.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae storm ar y mr yn gorfodi Pegwn i lochesu ar ynys greigiog, ddirgel. A storm washes Pegwn onto a mysterious, rocky island where he meets a band of lobster-like insects.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Yn siop chips Gareth yr orangwtan, mae'r peiriant chips wedi torri. Mae Harri'n trio helpu Elsie i'w drwsio, ond ma'r radio'n diffodd! The fryer is broken at Gareth the orangutan's chippie!

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae stwnsh tatws yn creu llu o ryseitiau 'superblasus'. Colleen Ramsey on food nostalgia. This time - how to create some delicious recipes from a variety of mash potato. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Mae Kristy a Jon o Dim Rygbi Byddar Cymru yma a byddwn yn arddangosfa Joe Galvin yn Llundain. Kristy Hopkins and Jon Cudd from Wales Deaf Rugby Union are here & we visit an exhibition.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Byddwn yn teithio o Abergwaun i Abercastell heddiw. Bydd Bedwyr yn cyfarfod gof ym Mhen Caer ac yn chwilio am olion hen gapel. This week we'll be travelling from Fishguard to Abercastle.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn ystod oes pan mae bywyd gwyllt o dan fygythiad difrifol, edrycha Iolo ar gyflwr natur Cymru. During an age in which wildlife is under threat, Iolo looks at the state of Wales' nature.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd i'r ysbyty i ddysgu sut mae doctoriaid a nyrsus yn edrych ar eich hl pan 'da chi ddim yn teimo'n dda. The Tralalas look at the ways doctors and nurses care for you.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Hi! Welcome to a new series of Jambor!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod mwncod yn byw mewn coed'? yw cwestiwn Jamal i Tad-cu heddiw. Why do monkeys live in trees? Tad-cu has an absurd story, full o fun about two cheeky monkeys named Jess and Caleb.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni a Jini yn mynd ar nerfau ei gilydd. Ond wedi noson yng nghwmni eu cefnder annifyr, buan mae pethau'n newid. Joni and Jini get on each other's nerves but soon enough things change.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri yn cael galwad i ddweud bod cwch wedi torri yng Nglan Llyn. Yno hefyd mae Tomi wedi cicio pl i'r llyn! Harri gets a call to say that a boat has broken down in Glan Llyn.

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae Lloyd yn ceisio darbwyllo pawb nad os arno ofn pan fyddant yn ymweld ag atyniad newydd arswydus. Lloyd tries to convince everyone he's not afraid when they visit a spooky new attraction.

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae ymdrechion y teulu Mwmin i helpu merch swil iawn yn gwneud pethau'n waeth. A fedr Mwmintrol ddysgu gwrando'n iawn arni? The Moomin family's efforts to help a shy girl make things worse.

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn l dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: Pwy fydd yn clirio'r clwydi, yn trechu'r triple-bar ac yn llwyddo i oresgyn yr oxer yn y bennod hon o Ceffylau Cymru? Nia takes a look at the world of showjumping with trainer Eurig Eynon.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Mae'r cyflwynydd Arfon Haines Davies yn cael ei aduno ffrind ysgol, yr artist John Rowlands, sy'n profi'r her o beintio portread ohono. This time: Arfon Haines Davies and John Rowlands.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Daw Tom i achub Ffion - ond ddylsa hi ei drystio? Mae Lleucu yn rhoi Eileen yn ei lle, ac mae Sion yn cael cynnig swydd gan y gelyn. Tom comes to Ffion's rescue - but should she trust him?

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Daw Trystan i'r canlyniad bod rhaid gweithredu er mwyn cael ei rieni i weld synnwyr. A letter arrives from the hospital which begs the question whether Lowri should start sharing her news.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.desc: Tro ma, mynd at wraidd y gwir mae Vinny, Dan a Chris o'r Uned Troseddau Ffyrdd. This time, Vinny chases a motorbike in Rhyl, Dan stops a driverless car, & Chris solves a mystery in Wrexham.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau o'r gemau rygbi diweddaraf. Highlights of the latest rugby games.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Yr actor ffilm a theledu Paul Rhys sy'n dysgu Cymraeg tro ma efo help ei ffrind Dyfan Dwyfor. Film and TV actor Paul Rhys learns Welsh with the help of his co-actor on Men Up, Dyfan Dwyfor.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn mwynhau dawnsio ond pa liwiau sy'n gwneud y partneriaid gorau? The Colourblocks enjoy a dance, but which colours make the best partners?

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn mae'r daith yn mynd i'r mor i gwrdd a Cheffyl y mor ac i ben y coed i gwrdd a'r Gibon. We journey under the sea to meet the Sea Horse and up into the trees to find the Gibbon.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Er bod Guto'n gorfod gwarchod Nel Gynffon-wen, mae'n cael ei ddenu at ddigwyddiad cyffrous yng ngwersyll y Wiwerod. Guto is left to babysit Nel Gynffon-wen. What could go wrong?

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn l
programme.desc: Stori o'r Rhyfel Byd Cynta' sydd gan Tadcu i Ceti heddiw yn 'Amser Maith Maith yn l'. Today, Grandad has a story from the first World War.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ac mae'n gallu bod yn ddi-amynedd. Heddiw, nid yw eisiau disgwyl i'r pwdin fod yn barod. Pablo doesn't want to wait for a blancmange to set!

programme.title: New: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bochau wedi cael llond bol ar fwyta bresych, ac felly'n codi pac ac yn mynd ar ei wyliau i Fferm Ty Mawr! Bochau is fed up with eating cabbage all night and day and heads for the farm!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael gorymdaith i ddathu ei cyfeillgarwch! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a parade to celebrate their friendship.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd llygod bach a Gwen a'i neidr. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Today we meet some little mice and Gwen and her snake.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae Fflwff yn darganfod sgarff i'r Capten gael cogio morio arni, ac mae gan Seren br o fenyg arbennig iawn. Fflwff finds a scarf so the Captain can pretend to be on the high seas.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw yn gwneud car allan o focs cardfwrdd ac yn mynd 'i ffrindiau ar daith i lan y mr ac i siopa. Stiw makes a pretend car of the new washing machine's box.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Jac yn cael parti 'pobl sy'n helpu' gyda Cwnstabl Jms o Cacamwnci. Jac will be having a 'people who help' party with Cwnstabl Jms from Cacamwnci.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r cwn yn mynd ar eu gwyliau i fferm Gorllewin Gwyllt Mr Whilber. Ond mae Euryn Peryglus wedi mynd efo nhw. The pups are going on holiday to Mr Whilber's Wild West farm!

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: O'r mat i'r llwyfan, perfformio yw bywyd Efa Haf. Ond a fydd hi'n cael gwireddu ei breuddwyd o fod yn Dywysoges Carnifal Caernarfon? Will Efa be crowned Carnival Princess of Caernarfon?

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Mas yng nghaeau'r fferm mae bwgan brain mewn dillad carpiog yn ceisio ei orau glas i gadw'r adar drygionus rhag dwyn hadau. Standing in the field is a shabby-clothed, bird-scaring scarecrow!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Llywelyn, ci'r garddwr, wedi colli ei asgwrn ac wrth dyllu amdano mae'n disgyn i fyd y tyrchod! When Llywelyn the dog starts to burrow for his bone, he falls into the moles' world!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, efo disgyblion Ysgol Gymraeg Bro Teyr. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish into something special.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Gwiber yn creu trafferth glan yr afon er mwyn cael bwyta tarten afal taffi Dan i gyd. Gwiber sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Dan's toffee apple pie.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Does dim gwell gan Deian a Loli na chwarae yn yr Arcd, ac ma'r ddau'n benderfynol o guro Tegan meddal o'r peiriant crafanc. Deian and Loli love playing in the Arcade - especially the claw!

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Nid yw Pablo'n gallu dweud wrth nain beth mae o eisie i frecwast. Mae'n rhaid i'r anifeiliaid ei helpu ffeindio'r geiriau i esbonio beth mae ei angen. The animals help Pablo with brekkie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Mrs Moss wedi cyrraedd rownd derfynol gwobr Pennaeth Gorau Cymru. Mae Miss Enfys wedi rhoi Anni yng ngofal trefnu'r parti! Mrs Moss has reached the finals of the Best Welsh Head prize!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn a Help Llaw yn adeiladu parc themau anhygoel! On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn and Help Llaw have built an amazing theme park!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Morgan y neidr filtroed a Lola a'i ieir. Today we meet Morgan the millipede and Lola and her hens.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'r fowlen golchi llestri yn llawn swigod ac mae Fflwff wrth ei fodd yn eu dynwared. Mae Seren yn hoffi swn y dwr yn arllwys i mewn i'r sinc. Ond beth mae'r Capten yn ei wneud yn y sinc?

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Pa anifeiliaid fyddwn ni'n dysgu amdan heddiw, tybed? Which animals are we going to be meeting today?

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn dod ar draws arth fach drist. Mae gan yr arth bentwr o lyfrau. Tybed a fydd darllen stori'n codi calon yr arth fach? Will reading a story help to cheer up a sad little bear?

programme.title: Teulu Ni
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, Dylan Hall o Gwm-y-Glo fydd yn tywys ni drwy'r digwyddiadau mawr a bach sy'n digwydd yn ei deulu ef. Dylan Hall from Cwm-y-Glo guides us through his family life.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith Yn Ol
programme.desc: Heddiw yn 'Amser Maith Maith Yn l', mae neges wedi cyrraedd Llys Llywelyn bod y Tywysog ar ei ffordd! In today's 'Amser Maith Maith yn l', the story takes us back to the Middle ages.

programme.desc: Heddiw fydd 'na dri o'r byd newyddion a thywydd o gwmpas y Bwrdd i Dri. In this episode we have three from news and weather meeting and eating around the table.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, creaduriaid yr ardd fydd yn cael y sylw: y Mwydyn a'r Pry cop. In this programme we look at animals that live in our garden: the Worm and the Spider.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: O na! Mae Dad wedi anghofio ei bod yn ben-blwydd ar Mam-gu! Gall cacen munud ola' gan Dad a rap gan Anni a Cai ei phlesio? Oh no! Dad has forgotten that it's Mam-gu's birthday!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Pigog yn dysgu chwarae gwyddbwyll ond mae'n casu colli. Cyn bo hir 'does neb eisiau chwarae gyda hi! When Pigog learns to play chess, she fails to win gracefully. Oh-no!

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn l
programme.desc: Heddiw mae gan Tadcu stori o Oes Fictoria ac ma Ceti yn edrych mlaen at glywed am Ceridwen a'i brawd Gerallt sy'n byw ar Fferm Llwyn yr Eos. Today grandad has a story from Victorian times.

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, mae'r Doniolis yn cael eu galw i amddiffyn y castell, ond dydy'r porthor ddim yn hapus.. o gwbl! In this programme, the Doniolis are called upon to protect the castle!

programme.title: Ar Goll yn Oz
programme.desc: Mae Langwidere yn carcharu Dorothy y tu mewn i baentiad hudol, ond mae ein harwyr yn dod o hyd i borth cyfrinachol. Langwidere imprisons Dorothy inside a magical painting.

programme.title: Parti
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae tair cyflwynydd ifanc newydd yn helpu tm o ffrindiau creu parti Blwyddyn 6. New series. Three young presenters help a team of friends create a leavers party for year 6.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Mae'r daith yn mynd ni o Borthgain i Solfach. Byddwn yn ymweld ag Ynys Ddewi a chael hanes twrch rheibus! The journey takes us from Porthgain to Solva with tales of a rampant wild boar!

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Daw Trystan i'r canlyniad bod rhaid gweithredu er mwyn cael ei rieni i weld synnwyr. A letter arrives from the hospital which begs the question whether Lowri should start sharing her news.

programme.title: The Stranger
programme.desc: 1946. Drama nominated for an Oscar. Directed by Orson Welles. A war crimes investigator is on the trail of an infamous Nazi. Stars Orson Welles, Edward G. Robinson & Loretta Young. [S]

programme.title: Hollow Triumph
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directed by Steve Sekely. Stars Paul Henreid, Joan Bennett, Leslie Brooks & Eduard Franz. Pursued by the gambler he robbed, John Muller takes on a new identity, with ironic results. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Link-Up
programme.desc: 1969. A special look at the use of the radio in today's police force and how the radio plays a vital role in the job of the policeman.

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: Cattle Mutilations. A look at the strange, unexplained cattle mutilations which have plagued US ranchers in the south-west for the last 25 years. (S1, E06)

programme.title: Larry Adler
programme.desc: 1959. In this rare reel, American harmonica player Larry Adler performs with pianist Ellis Larkins. He plays an original composition as well as Bach, Mozart, Gershwin and W.C. Handy.

programme.title: Carry On Admiral
programme.desc: 1957. Comedy directed by Val Guest and starring David Tomlinson, Peggy Cummins & Alfie Bass. An MP is mistaken for his naval friend and put in charge of the fighting ship HMS Sherwood! [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout May. [S]

programme.title: Home to Danger
programme.desc: 1951. Crime. Director: Terence Fisher. Stars Alan Wheatley, Guy Rolfe & Stanley Baker. Barbara returns from abroad after her father ended his life. A changed will leaves Barbara in mortal danger. [S]

programme.title: Child in the House
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Director: Cy Endfield. Stars Phyllis Calvert, Eric Portman & Stanley Baker. A girl is left with her relatives while her mother is in hospital. Her father, a crook, pays her a visit. [S]

programme.title: Kill Her Gently
programme.desc: 1957. Thriller. Directed by Charles Saunders. Stars Griffith Jones, Maureen Connell & Marc Lawrence. Two convicts who escape prison are picked up by a motorist who helps them on the run. [S]

programme.title: Trafic
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. Features Marcel Fraval & Honor Bostel. Mr. Hulot travels to Amsterdam to showcase his new camper van and encounters several hurdles on the way. [S]

programme.title: The Great Game
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Diana Dors, Thora Hird & John Laurie. A wealthy chairman of Burnville United makes an unethical approach to a star player of another club. [S]

programme.title: Miranda
programme.desc: 1948. Comedy. Director: Ken Annakin. Stars: Glynis Johns, Googie Withers, Margaret Rutherford. A light comedy about a beautiful and playful mermaid and her effect on Dr. Paul Martin. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Playback. 1962. Directed by Quentin Lawrence. Stars Margit Saad, Barry Foster & Victoria Platt. A Police officer awaits a life-changing verdict and reflects on his own arrest. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: The Key Witness. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Robert Arden & Robert Bruce. Smith races a paid gunman to find a witness to a gangland killing and learns that the gunman is on his way to England. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Tut's Case is Shut. 1966. Stars Adam West, Marianna Hill, Sid Haig. Robin reveals that Gordon's secretary, Miss Cleo Patrick, is working for Tut and plans to slip the Commissioner a scarab mickey. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: The Great Gold Robbery. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Peter Allenby & John Howlett. Thieves target the Edinburgh to London mail train; the only clue Maguire finds is a footprint by the railway track. [S]

programme.title: The Intruder (1953)
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Director: Guy Hamilton. Stars Jack Hawkins, Dennis Price, Michael Medwin, George Cole & Hugh Williams. An ex Colonel catches one of his former men robbing his house and investigates. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro welcomes all her cellar dwelling friends back for a night of fascinating films. First, is the 1962 horror The Cabinet of Caligari starring the late Glynis Johns, with Dan O'Herlihy. [S]

programme.title: The Cabinet of Caligari
programme.desc: 1962. Horror. Directed by Roger Kay. Stars Glynis Johns, Dan O'Herlihy & Richard Davalos. A girl becomes trapped in the mysterious estate of Dr. Caligari after seeking help to repair a flat tyre. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Next up is a fast-paced horror film with plenty of typical 1980s ingredients. Caroline Munro introduces the 1982 feature Mortuary, starring Mary McDonough and David Wallace. [S]

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: 1982. Horror. Directed by Howard Avedis. Stars Mary Beth McDonough, David Wysocki & Bill Paxton. Convinced that her father's death was not an accident, a young woman decides to investigate. [S]

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: 1982. Horror. Directed by Howard Avedis. Stars Mary Beth McDonough, David Wysocki & Bill Paxton. Convinced that her father's death was not an accident, a young woman decides to investigate. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Set your alarms for next week, as Caroline gives us a look at the strange and scary films to enjoy next time. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: Mark of the Devil. 1984. Stars Dirk Benedict & Jenny Seagrove. A desperate gambler robs a tattoo artist, but he is pricked by an inking needle and marked with a cursed tattoo. [S]

programme.title: The Black Book
programme.desc: 1949. Thriller. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Robert Cummings, Richard Basehart & Richard Hart. A powerful man desperately searches for his black book, a list of those marked for the guillotine. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed's Dilemma. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Bea Benaderet. Granny and Cousin Pearl fight over who's going to take care of the cooking and the house, leading Jed to step in. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: The Unwanted. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Robert Bray. After killing a man in self defense, his widow forces their young daughter into Luke's care. [S]

programme.title: Dateline Diamonds
programme.desc: 1965. Directed By Jeremy Summers. Comedy musical stars The Small Faces, The Chantelles and Kiki Dee. Lester Benson (Kenneth Cope) the manager of top rock band The Small Faces, is hiding a secret. [S]

programme.title: The Scarlet Web
programme.desc: 1954. Crime drama directed by Charles Saunders. An insurance investigator is framed for murder after a client is found dead. Starring Griffith Jones and Hazel Court. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: Yellow-Belly
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Laslo Benedek. Stars Frank Lovejoy & Maxine Cooper. A circumspect veteran is re-called to fight in Korea but is deemed a coward by the young members of his company.

programme.title: Room to Let
programme.desc: 1950. Thriller. Director: Godfrey Grayson. Stars Jimmy Hanley, Valentine Dyall, Merle Tottenham. A woman and her daughter rent a room out to the mysterious Dr. Fell, but is he who he claims to be? [S]

programme.title: Hell Drivers
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director C. Raker Endfield. Stars Stanley Baker, David McCallum, Sid James and Sean Connery. Tom signs up as a 'Hell Driver', but the death-trap roads are the least of his problems. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Saturday. 1974. Stars Jennifer Wilson, Jean Anderson & Sean Caffrey. Hammond Transport faces strike action again. Meanwhile, Ted and Brian take Mary on a picnic, where they retreat into the past. [S]

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: 1950. Western. Directed by George Templeton. Stars Robert Preston, Robert Sterling & Chill Wills. Brothers on opposite sides of the law unite to save the family cattle ranch from rustlers. [S]

programme.title: Laxdale Hall
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. Car owners of a remote Scottish village refuse to pay road funds until a proper road has been built. Starring Ronald Squire, Fulton Mackay & Prunella Scales. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Groove along to British pop group The Avons and their song Do It With You (I Wanna Do It).

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Chris Robinson's Premonitions/Pete the Poltergeist. 1994. Michael Aspel introduces more stories of the unexplained, including the touching tale of a poltergeist who haunted a couple in Cardiff. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Hunch. 1976. Stars Shirley Allen & Hetty Baynes. When a girl goes missing, door-to-door inquiries lead nowhere, but Haggar has a lead on stolen cameras, taking the case in an unexpected direction. [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Little Man, What Next? Part 1. 1970. Stars Robert Hardy, Jack Watson & Jane Jordan Rogers. Lutzig arrests Gratz, who is tortured in an effort to push him to betray Nina. Will he be able to resist? [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret and the Fortune Hunter. 2001. Stars Bruno Cremer, Michael Lonsdale & Renaud Danner. Maigret enters the world of canals and barges when a woman is found strangled in the stable at Lock 14. [S]

programme.title: Radio Days
programme.desc: 1987. Comedy. Directed by Woody Allen. Stars Mia Farrow, Dianne Wiest & Mike Starr. The nostalgic story of an ordinary family in Queens, N.Y. is told alongside vignettes of radio's golden era. [S]

programme.title: Hunting Venus
programme.desc: 1999. Comedy. Directed by and stars Martin Clunes. Also featuring Neil Morrissey & Jane Horrocks. A one-hit-wonder 1980s band are forced against their will to re-form for one last performance. [S]
